structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
FINANCE AND REVENUE OF CITIES OTHER THAN THE FIRST CLASS

law.history: Repealed 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 434, sec. 15, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 185, sec. 2. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 3629a-7, 3631, 3677, 3687, 3694

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Collection of city taxes in cities of fifth and sixth classes.
